generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}body{font-family:Roboto Slab,serif,monospace;font-size:15px;font-weight:500;line-height:1.6;color:#655a56;min-height:calc(100vh - 2vw);position:relative}.ml-auto{margin-left:auto}.navbar{padding:10px 20px}.navbar-nav .nav-item{display:flex;place-items:center;margin:10px}.navbar-nav .nav-item .nav-link{font-size:.8em;font-weight:700}.navbar-nav .nav-item .signup{background-color:#f73e3e;color:#fff!important;width:200px;border-radius:20px;text-align:center}.navbar-nav .nav-item auto 20px;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;overflow-x:auto}.main .container .cuisines .categories .btn{font-size:.8em;width:150px;border-radius:20px;padding:10px 15px}.main .container .btn-outline-danger:hover{color:#fff}.user{display:flex;place-items:center}.search{background-color:#eee;border-radius:10px;margin:50px auto;width:80%}.search__form{margin:0 #ddd}.search__field:focus{outline:none}.search__btn{background-color:inherit;color:#aaa;width:10%;height:100%;position:absolute;right:0}.search__results{width:100%;height:max-content}.main .container .mobile{padding:12px}.main .container .mobile .mobile-info{margin:5px 0;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.main .container .mobile .mobile-info h3{color:#111;font-weight:700}.main .container .mobile .mobile-info p{line-height:2}.app-container{padding:0;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.main .container .mobile .app-photo{width:100%;height:max-content}.card{margin:7px;cursor:pointer}.card:hover{transform:scale(1.05);box-shadow:3px 3px 3px #ddd}.card:active{transform:scale(.97);box-shadow:2px 2px 2px #ccc}.pages{width:100%;background-color:inherit;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin:10px auto;padding:20px}.pages__btn--next,.pages__btn--prev{width:100px;background-color:#fff;color:#333;padding:10px 20px;border-radius:10px}.pages__btn--prev{justify-self:flex-start}.pages__btn--next{justify-self:flex-end}.recipe .recipe-content{margin:auto 5px;line-height:2}.recipe .recipe-content .recipe-price,.recipe .recipe-content .recipe-title{font-size:1.1em;font-size:bold;color:#111}.recipe .recipe-content .recipe-text{text-align:justify;font-size:.8em;font-size:bold;color:#999}.recipe .recipe-img{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.recipe .recipe-img .recipe-asset{width:99%;height:90%;border-radius:50%}.modal__form p{cursor:pointer}.modal__form p:hover{text-decoration:underline}.toggle-modal{cursor:pointer}.toggle-modal:hover{text-decoration:underline}#order-modal .order-error,#signin-modal .email-error,#signin-modal
